thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Global Stocks Extend Gains as Trade Tensions Cool

author: Riva Gold
title: Global Stocks Extend Gains as Trade Tensions Cool
text:
U.S. stocks slid Tuesday, giving up some gains a day after waning concerns about trade tensions between the U.S. and China helped send major global indexes to their highest close in months.
Shares waffled between small gains and losses for most of the session before turning lower in the final 90 minutes of trading. Industrial stocks—which powered Monday’s rally after Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said the U.S. would suspend its efforts to apply tariffs to $150 billion in Chinese imports—were among the biggest losers....
